factoryName.metadata: Nombre de instancia de Data Factory

scriptLines:
query: 'SELECT DISTINCT
    fecha
FROM silver.llamadas
WHERE fecha IS NOT NULL',

query: 'SELECT DISTINCT
    numero,
    imei
FROM silver.datos
WHERE numero IS NOT NULL AND imei IS NOT NULL',

query: 'SELECT DISTINCT
    rbs_utilizada AS radiobase,
    celda,
    latitud,
    longitud
FROM silver.datos
WHERE rbs_utilizada IS NOT NULL',
query: 'SELECT DISTINCT servicio\nFROM silver.llamadas\nWHERE servicio IS NOT NULL',
query: 'SELECT DISTINCT registro\nFROM silver.llamadas\nWHERE registro IS NOT NULL',

query: 'select 
    id_radiobase,
    radiobase,
    celda,
    latitud,
    longitud
from gold.dim_radiobase',
